LABEL: 0x323
STRING: We ran down the dark hallway.

LABEL: 0x343
STRING: The hallway was illuminated by a dim light, thanks to Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x37F
STRING: We did our best to take full advantage of it――

LABEL: 0x3B5
STRING: We ran away from Touri as fast as we could.

LABEL: 0x438
STRING: 「Tokiwa, down!」

LABEL: 0x467
STRING: 「Hoh!」

LABEL: 0x484
STRING: Stairs.

LABEL: 0x498
STRING: I took her hand and sprinted.

LABEL: 0x4C2
STRING: ...Damn, she's slow.

LABEL: 0x4E4
STRING: With the handicap of her wearing her kimono, it was hard to imagine Tokiwa running any faster.

LABEL: 0x54C
STRING: I glanced over at the girl beside me.

LABEL: 0x590
STRING: I had no room for wicked thoughts.

LABEL: 0x61D
STRING: 「Tokiwa, I'm sorry!」

LABEL: 0x6AB
STRING: 「Wha?」

LABEL: 0x6C8
STRING: 「――Ayup!」

LABEL: 0x700
STRING: Without waiting for her reply, I wrapped my arms around her waist and picked her up.

LABEL: 0x74A
STRING: I felt a weight on both of my arms, wrapped in soft, layered clothing.

LABEL: 0x7AF
STRING: 「Oh, huh?」

LABEL: 0x7CE
STRING: Tokiwa muttered in a monotone voice.

LABEL: 0x7F0
STRING: It was probably a conditioned reflex, but her reaction was off.

LABEL: 0x826
STRING: She clung tightly to my neck with both hands.

LABEL: 0x862
STRING: Okay... It was definitely faster like this.

LABEL: 0x907
STRING: I ran down the stairs and headed straight for the first floor.

LABEL: 0x939
STRING: Speaking of which...

LABEL: 0x955
STRING: ――Just a few hours ago,

LABEL: 0x979
STRING: I had taken this same route.

LABEL: 0x99F
STRING: Maybe it was because I'd done nothing but run around inside the <SHEEP III>, but...

LABEL: 0x9EC
STRING: I felt like I was getting used to running like this.

LABEL: 0xA18
STRING: Before as the pursuer and this time as the one being chased...

LABEL: 0xA52
STRING: I had to run.

LABEL: 0xA85
STRING: 「Hey, give me the key!!」

LABEL: 0xAB2
STRING: I heard a voice from above.

LABEL: 0xAD2
STRING: A scream.

LABEL: 0xAE8
STRING: It seemed to be coming from not too far away.

LABEL: 0xB1A
STRING: ――This is bad. She's going to catch up to us.

LABEL: 0xB9F
STRING: I looked left and right.

LABEL: 0xBBB
STRING: ...Even if we went into one of the rooms, there was no escape.

LABEL: 0xBF9
STRING: It'd be tough if we were forced into a siege battle...

LABEL: 0xC27
STRING: As I reached the first floor, I lowered Tokiwa down.

LABEL: 0xCD9
STRING: 「We can't keep going like this.」

LABEL: 0xD08
STRING: 「Do you have any good ideas?」

LABEL: 0xD9C
STRING: 「Each floor of the <SHEEP III> has a circular structure.」

LABEL: 0xDDF
STRING: 「Topologically speaking...」

LABEL: 0xE64
STRING: 「There's no question about it! The best option is to keep circling in one direction.」

LABEL: 0xEB3
STRING: 「Rejected!」

LABEL: 0xEE7
STRING: ...This was no time for exchanges like this!

LABEL: 0xF1D
STRING: If we ran into Yukari in the midst of all this fuss――

LABEL: 0xF55
STRING: Yes, Touri wasn't the only threat.

LABEL: 0xF81
STRING: It was true that she was half-crazed and carrying a knife. In a way, she was a threat, but on the other hand, she was someone we had to protect.

LABEL: 0xFE1
STRING: The real threat was Yukari. She was prowling the ship looking to kill her while carrying a speargun.

LABEL: 0x103B
STRING: And, there was that light as well.

LABEL: 0x1077
STRING: Besides, we were on a timer to begin with.

LABEL: 0x10B2
STRING: In another 18 hours, the heating on this ship would be cut off, and a freezing cold of midwinter would arrive.

LABEL: 0x110A
STRING: Before that, some system would probably fail, and the equilibrium on board would be broken.

LABEL: 0x11C3
STRING: 「Right...」

LABEL: 0x11DF
STRING: Looking at the situation from another perspective, I realized a single course of action.

LABEL: 0x1215
STRING: There was no point in running.

LABEL: 0x123B
STRING: We couldn't run away.

LABEL: 0x125D
STRING: We ran out of the theater room to stop Yukari from committing murder, didn't we?

LABEL: 0x12BD
STRING: One thing we could do now that we didn't know where she was, was to keep hold of Touri.

LABEL: 0x131B
STRING: Subduing Touri――

LABEL: 0x133F
STRING: I needed some tools if I were to do that.

LABEL: 0x136B
STRING: And tools would be... in the warehouse of the rear section?

LABEL: 0x1461
STRING: 「Tokiwa, the rear section!」

LABEL: 0x14F3
STRING: 「Understood.」

LABEL: 0x158D
STRING: I took her hand and started running.

LABEL: 0x15BF
STRING: We passed through the bridge to the rear section where our target was.

LABEL: 0x15F9
STRING: We crossed the area where Reiri's body had been before.

LABEL: 0x1707
STRING: I looked at it again, but there really was nothing there.

LABEL: 0x1792
STRING: I remembered her figure inside the rescue ship from earlier.

LABEL: 0x17C2
STRING: A naive reality where that had been just an illusion didn't exist.

LABEL: 0x17F0
STRING: Besides, there was no time for sentimentality.

LABEL: 0x187D
STRING: Like before, footsteps could be heard from somewhere not too close but not too far away.

LABEL: 0x18C9
STRING: ――It was Touri.

LABEL: 0x18E1
STRING: Tokiwa and I ran through the bridge.

LABEL: 0x1998
STRING: I felt a strange sense of discomfort.

LABEL: 0x19B2
STRING: I wondered what it was.

LABEL: 0x19CC
STRING: I felt the same sensation earlier...

LABEL: 0x1A64
STRING: No, now was not the time to be thinking about that!

LABEL: 0x1AA0
STRING: I shook my head and focused on the present.

LABEL: 0x1B4E
STRING: 「It's the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x1B75
STRING: 「Let's go to the warehouse. There might be something we can use as a weapon.」

LABEL: 0x1BBB
STRING: A crisis was looming over us.

LABEL: 0x1BD3
STRING: We couldn't keep running away forever.

LABEL: 0x1C05
STRING: If we didn't find a way to stand up to her as soon as possible――

LABEL: 0x1CA9
STRING: 「No!」

LABEL: 0x1CC5
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, please stop.」

LABEL: 0x1CF4
STRING: 「Why?!」

LABEL: 0x1D18
STRING: Tokiwa grabbed my clothes and forced me to stop.

LABEL: 0x1D58
STRING: I turned around to protest, but she wasn't looking at me.

LABEL: 0x1DB2
STRING: At the end of the hallway, far beyond there...

LABEL: 0x1DD6
STRING: It was as if she was the only one who saw something in that empty space.

LABEL: 0x1E24
STRING: Did Tokiwa spot something?

LABEL: 0x1E46
STRING: ――It was only for a moment.

LABEL: 0x1E72
STRING: The moment I noticed, Tokiwa pointed straight in front of her.

LABEL: 0x1F1C
STRING: 「――It's coming.」

LABEL: 0x1F5D
STRING: And so, from where she was pointing, indescribable points of light appeared once more.

LABEL: 0x2053
STRING: 「――Why now of all times!?」

LABEL: 0x207B
STRING: We were completely pincered.

LABEL: 0x209B
STRING: In front of us was the light, and behind was Touri with a knife.

LABEL: 0x20D7
STRING: There was nowhere left to run in this narrow passageway between sections――

LABEL: 0x2189
STRING: 「Damn it!」

LABEL: 0x21A1
STRING: ...There was no other choice.

LABEL: 0x21BF
STRING: I hated to admit it, but...

LABEL: 0x21EB
STRING: I opened to door to a room that was nearest to us.

LABEL: 0x2219
STRING: We went inside and closed the door.

LABEL: 0x229F
STRING: The two of us stood there in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x22C5
STRING: I leaned my back against the wall on the hallway side and crouched down on the floor.

LABEL: 0x2305
STRING: 「Haah, haah.」

LABEL: 0x2334
STRING: 「Haah, phew...」

LABEL: 0x235B
STRING: Both Tokiwa and I were breathing heavily, exhausted from running around in the hallway.

LABEL: 0x239F
STRING: I managed to catch my breath and form words.

LABEL: 0x23C9
STRING: 「...This is a dead end.」

LABEL: 0x23FC
STRING: 「Haah, phew...」

LABEL: 0x2423
STRING: But... with that luminescent organism roaming nearby,

LABEL: 0x2463
STRING: even Touri would not be able to reach here easily.

LABEL: 0x249D
STRING: It was hard to imagine her using her knife to eradicate that light.

LABEL: 0x2559
STRING: 「What are we going to do now?」

LABEL: 0x2592
STRING: 「Let's just stay here for now.」

LABEL: 0x25C0
STRING: Beyond that... I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x25EC
STRING: Touri knew where we had gone, and if we tried to exit this room, we would fall victim to that light.

LABEL: 0x2644
STRING: How could we get out of this room safely...?

LABEL: 0x268A
STRING: I didn't have any great ideas.

LABEL: 0x26CE
STRING: 「Tokiwa, what do you think we should do?」

LABEL: 0x272E
STRING: There was no response.

LABEL: 0x274A
STRING: We had been here for a while now, in total darkness.

LABEL: 0x2772
STRING: Anxiety suddenly passed through my mind.

LABEL: 0x279A
STRING: 「...Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0x27B8
STRING: Don't tell me she was――

LABEL: 0x27D8
STRING: However, my concerns were unfounded.

LABEL: 0x2874
STRING: 「*Sniff*... *Sniff*...」

LABEL: 0x289B
STRING: Tokiwa was sniffing quietly.

LABEL: 0x28C3
STRING: What the hell was she doing?

LABEL: 0x28E9
STRING: 「What are you doing?」

LABEL: 0x2913
STRING: I spoke my mind.

LABEL: 0x2937
STRING: Tokiwa sniffed for a while, then replied.

LABEL: 0x29EB
STRING: 「Do you smell something funny?」

LABEL: 0x2A1C
STRING: 「Smell?」

LABEL: 0x2ABA
STRING: 「It's like oxidized blood, or...」

LABEL: 0x2B2D
STRING: She was about to say something but stammered unnaturally.

LABEL: 0x2B61
STRING: Like she had found something.

LABEL: 0x2BEE
STRING: ...But, what was there to find in this darkness?

LABEL: 0x2C7F
STRING: What did she see?

LABEL: 0x2CF6
STRING: ...Could she see something?

LABEL: 0x2D79
STRING: Something only her eyes could see...

LABEL: 0x2DFE
STRING: It was――

LABEL: 0x2E82
STRING: 「...This might be bad.」

LABEL: 0x2EB1
STRING: Her warning came too late.

LABEL: 0x2F76
STRING: Right as she said it, the light from before emerged before us.

LABEL: 0x2FB6
STRING: 「Shit...!」

LABEL: 0x2FD2
STRING: I stood up, stuck to the wall, and took a step back.

LABEL: 0x3004
STRING: I thought we'd be safe as long as we were in this room, but... I was too naive.

LABEL: 0x3048
STRING: Nowhere on the <SHEEP III> was safe right now.

LABEL: 0x3081
STRING: It was foolish of me to feel at ease without being sure.

LABEL: 0x30C1
STRING: We needed to get out of here right away...

LABEL: 0x3133
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x314B
STRING: There was definitely something different about this...

LABEL: 0x317F
STRING: This was not the luminescent organism.

LABEL: 0x31AB
STRING: Although it was filled with the same kind of light, it didn't really have a form like an insect.

LABEL: 0x320B
STRING: Rather, it was――

LABEL: 0x322D
STRING: The same as what had been lying inside the rescue ship――

LABEL: 0x3258
STRING: My eyes gradually adjusted to the darkness.

LABEL: 0x3286
STRING: Even though I was used to seeing it by now, the ominous feeling didn't disappear. A sinister-colored light.

LABEL: 0x32DA
STRING: An outline of something came to view.

LABEL: 0x3306
STRING: ――And there, I saw it.

LABEL: 0x334A
STRING: The source of the discomfort I had felt when I passed through the hallway earlier.

LABEL: 0x33EC
STRING: Yes...

LABEL: 0x3404
STRING: I see, so that's how it was...

LABEL: 0x3502
STRING: 「"What are you doing?!" Those were his last words.」

LABEL: 0x355E
STRING: 「Reiri-chan then pushed the man down.」

LABEL: 0x3592
STRING: 「She pushed him with all her strength.」

LABEL: 0x35BB
STRING: ―――Tokiwa did say that.

LABEL: 0x35E9
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x36CE
STRING: 「Reiri――!」

LABEL: 0x36EA
STRING: 「Reiri, Reiri,

LABEL: 0x3708
STRING: Reiri――」

LABEL: 0x3727
STRING: "In the middle of the dark passage."

LABEL: 0x374D
STRING: "One person was lying on the ground."

LABEL: 0x37FC
STRING: ――One person.

LABEL: 0x3820
STRING: ――So,

LABEL: 0x3833
STRING: where had "he" gone?

LABEL: 0x3857
STRING: He had taken Tokiwa away.

LABEL: 0x3877
STRING: He had been attacked by that luminescent organism.

LABEL: 0x38A1
STRING: His corpse.

LABEL: 0x38B9
STRING: His corpse was gone before Reiri's body had moved.

LABEL: 0x38FF
STRING: Just like her, he had died from being enveloped in that light. So, where had his corpse gone?

LABEL: 0x3957
STRING: It was right here in front of me.

LABEL: 0x3A26
STRING: A man's corpse, shrouded in light.

LABEL: 0x3A4E
STRING: His corpse, which I had not seen since his death, was abandoned in a corner of the room, giving off a suspicious light.

LABEL: 0x3AD8
STRING: 「Why is his corpse here?」

LABEL: 0x3B0A
STRING: Reiri's dead body was inside the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x3B38
STRING: That man's dead body was in this room.

LABEL: 0x3B60
STRING: We had witnessed both of their deaths in the passageway.

LABEL: 0x3BA4
STRING: I wasn't delusional enough to think that their corpses had moved on their own.

LABEL: 0x3BE2
STRING: Someone moved them.

LABEL: 0x3C04
STRING: Someone, for some purpose... but...

LABEL: 0x3C38
STRING: Who in the world would do something like this, and why――

LABEL: 0x3CD8
STRING: 「Oh.」

LABEL: 0x3CF3
STRING: Before I knew it, Tokiwa was near the corpse, investigating with great interest.

LABEL: 0x3D4F
STRING: Seriously... Why couldn't this girl just sit still?

LABEL: 0x3D97
STRING: Calling her a natural scientist or an explorer sounded nice,

LABEL: 0x3DD7
STRING: but combined with her usual behavior, she seemed more like a curious child.

LABEL: 0x3E21
STRING: 「Don't touch it, Tokiwa!」

LABEL: 0x3EB1
STRING: 「Anyway, have a look, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x3EE0
STRING: "Anyway," she says...

LABEL: 0x3F04
STRING: After brushing me off, she folded her arms.

LABEL: 0x3F48
STRING: Did she find something...?

LABEL: 0x3FDA
STRING: 「Look, here.」

LABEL: 0x3FF8
STRING: 「This corpse.」

LABEL: 0x4017
STRING: Tokiwa pointed at the corpse's back which was emitting light.

LABEL: 0x404B
STRING: It looked grotesque up close, like an enemy from a horror game...

LABEL: 0x40C9
STRING: Combined with the luminescence, the corpse was slippery, smooth, and raw.

LABEL: 0x4105
STRING: At one spot on his back...

LABEL: 0x4127
STRING: There was something sharp sticking out.

LABEL: 0x4157
STRING: It was...

LABEL: 0x416F
STRING: A metal arrowhead――

LABEL: 0x418D
STRING: 「From a speargun...?」

LABEL: 0x41AF
STRING: There was no doubt about it.

LABEL: 0x41C9
STRING: This was the same kind of arrow that had pierced the door to the theater room earlier.

LABEL: 0x420F
STRING: It was an arrowhead from Yukari's speargun.

LABEL: 0x4239
STRING: But... why?

LABEL: 0x4259
STRING: It was too dark to tell earlier, but...

LABEL: 0x4289
STRING: Was it there originally?

LABEL: 0x42BD
STRING: ...I couldn't remember one way or the other.

LABEL: 0x4317
STRING: 「What do you think, Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0x433D
STRING: 「Why was this corpse shot with a speargun?」

LABEL: 0x43EF
STRING: 「Hmm.」

LABEL: 0x4405
STRING: 「Why he was shot, I don't know, but...」

LABEL: 0x4445
STRING: 「All I can say is that he probably wasn't dead yet at the time he was shot.」

LABEL: 0x44A8
STRING: 「...What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x44DD
STRING: 「He didn't die because he was enveloped in that light, but because he was shot by a speargun.」

LABEL: 0x455A
STRING: In other words, before the luminescent organism could attack anyone, Yukari had shot the man with a speargun...

LABEL: 0x45B0
STRING: Why would――

LABEL: 0x45CE
STRING: When did that happen?

LABEL: 0x45FC
STRING: 「Are you sure about that?」

LABEL: 0x468E
STRING: 「I'm not sure.」

LABEL: 0x46B2
STRING: 「But, it wouldn't make sense otherwise.」

LABEL: 0x46EF
STRING: Wouldn't make sense...?

LABEL: 0x4716
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x475C
STRING: 「――What reason is there

LABEL: 0x477D
STRING: to shoot a dead man?」

LABEL: 0x48D2
STRING: Someone banged on the door.

LABEL: 0x48EC
STRING: Roughly and crudely, they repeated it three or four times.

LABEL: 0x498C
STRING: 「――Open the door!」

LABEL: 0x49AA
STRING: 「I know you're in there!」

LABEL: 0x49D7
STRING: Touri's voice echoed through the door.

LABEL: 0x49FB
STRING: Tokiwa and I held our breaths and stared at the door.

LABEL: 0x4A31
STRING: I recalled that both Yukari and I had held our breath this way before as well.

LABEL: 0x4A7D
STRING: Where in the world was she... and what was she doing?

LABEL: 0x4B1A
STRING: Touri banged on the door over and over.

LABEL: 0x4B44
STRING: But, there was no problem.

LABEL: 0x4B68
STRING: Even if she was carrying a knife, she shouldn't be able to pry the door open with it.

LABEL: 0x4BC5
STRING: The locking system had recovered thanks to Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x4BFB
STRING: So, if we just bore it silently like this, eventually Touri would give up and――

LABEL: 0x4CF7
STRING: 「Oh, my...」

LABEL: 0x4D1A
STRING: Dark-red light shone into the room.

LABEL: 0x4D42
STRING: It was the color of the lights in the hallway.

LABEL: 0x4D6C
STRING: Slowly,

LABEL: 0x4D92
STRING: the door slid open.

LABEL: 0x4DBA
STRING: 「Tokiwa, the lock?」

LABEL: 0x4DE9
STRING: 「My parents lived in a house with sliding doors.」

LABEL: 0x4E10
STRING: She forgot to lock the door, in other words.

LABEL: 0x4E3E
STRING: Why couldn't she just say that...?

LABEL: 0x4E7A
STRING: At a time like this――

LABEL: 0x4F02
STRING: 「Why are you running away...?」

LABEL: 0x4F2F
STRING: Without having time to blame Tokiwa, I faced Touri, who entered the room.

LABEL: 0x4F7B
STRING: Her right hand was holding a knife like before, and in her left was...

LABEL: 0x4FE6
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x5032
STRING: 「Give me back Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x5050
STRING: 「Reiri's alive.」

LABEL: 0x5076
STRING: 「So, I have to bring her back to the surface.」

LABEL: 0x50C5
STRING: As she spoke, she walked toward me one step at a time.

LABEL: 0x5101
STRING: We were quickly cornered near the dead body of the man who had been abandoned at the back of the room.

LABEL: 0x51CB
STRING: 「Say something.」

LABEL: 0x51F5
STRING: 「You saved Reiri, didn't you?」

LABEL: 0x522F
STRING: 「Again and again... Then, you'd better save her this time, too.」

LABEL: 0x5273
STRING: 「Why would you betray her...?」

LABEL: 0x52A0
STRING: 「You're mistaken, Touri...」

LABEL: 0x52C4
STRING: What should I do?

LABEL: 0x52E2
STRING: What could I say to convince her?

LABEL: 0x530C
STRING: Could I make her understand?

LABEL: 0x5332
STRING: What should I do to stop Touri...?

LABEL: 0x5395
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...!」

LABEL: 0x53BA
STRING: Tokiwa whispered in my ear.

LABEL: 0x53DA
STRING: Her voice was a whisper, but her words were sharp.

LABEL: 0x5406
STRING: She pointed at Touri's feet.

LABEL: 0x54B4
STRING: I couldn't believe my eyes.

LABEL: 0x54DE
STRING: Touri walked toward us with unsteady steps.

LABEL: 0x5528
STRING: At her feet was that swarm of light――

LABEL: 0x55B7
STRING: 「Touri! Watch out!」

LABEL: 0x55D9
STRING: 「That light is at your feet――」

LABEL: 0x560E
STRING: 「Please, give me the key, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x5640
STRING: 「As long as I have that key, I can send Reiri to the surface.」

LABEL: 0x56AF
STRING: 「Listen to me, Touri!!」

LABEL: 0x56D7
STRING: Touri, treading through the swarm of light, did not stop.

LABEL: 0x5711
STRING: Did she not hear me...?

LABEL: 0x57AF
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x57DA
STRING: 「Touri, I left the key in the wheelhouse.」

LABEL: 0x587A
STRING: 「You have to help Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x58BF
STRING: 「Touri...」

LABEL: 0x58E8
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x5902
STRING: 「It might be too late for her.」

LABEL: 0x5933
STRING: Even as I tried to trick her, she didn't respond.

LABEL: 0x5973
STRING: The girl walked up to me, smiling absentmindedly with dark eyes.

LABEL: 0x59B5
STRING: She looked so lifeless that it made me think of a mannequin or a mechanical doll.

LABEL: 0x5A3F
STRING: How did things come to this...?

LABEL: 0x5A7B
STRING: I had just wanted to protect her smile, the smile of a normal girl who had gotten lost in the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x5AE1
STRING: I had been trying to get us back to the surface for her sake.

LABEL: 0x5B1D
STRING: Why did I have to see her like this?

LABEL: 0x5B63
STRING: Touri stared into empty space and smiled, her eyes still unfocused.

LABEL: 0x5C23
STRING: 「I'm your big sister...」

LABEL: 0x5CAA
STRING: 「Because I'm your big sister...」

LABEL: 0x5D2D
STRING: 「Why is everyone else...?」

LABEL: 0x5D73
STRING: 「Mom, why...?」

LABEL: 0x5DF8
STRING: 「Why Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x5E7B
STRING: 「Why was it Reiri?!」

LABEL: 0x5EA1
STRING: 「Why didn't you love me?!」

LABEL: 0x5F22
STRING: What was the saying――?

LABEL: 0x5F48
STRING: Touri's face twisted hideously, and she screamed like she couldn't contain her emotions anymore.

LABEL: 0x5F86
STRING: Those words without context were simply hatred.

LABEL: 0x5FB6
STRING: A curse.

LABEL: 0x5FCA
STRING: There was no meaning.

LABEL: 0x5FE8
STRING: It was a device that amplified her anger merely by chanting them.

LABEL: 0x604B
STRING: 「If Reiri's gone, how can I be loved?!!」

LABEL: 0x6098
STRING: Shoulders heaving, she screamed loudly.

LABEL: 0x60C0
STRING: Her wandering gaze eventually stopped at the girl wearing a traditional kimono.

LABEL: 0x61D3
STRING: 「It's Tokiwa-chan...」

LABEL: 0x6208
STRING: 「Akari-chan...」

LABEL: 0x6239
STRING: 「Tell me...」

LABEL: 0x6261
STRING: 「What am I supposed to do?」

LABEL: 0x62C7
STRING: 「You're smart, aren't you?」

LABEL: 0x62F7
STRING: 「Just like her...」

LABEL: 0x637C
STRING: 「Reiri...」

LABEL: 0x6435
STRING: 「...Why you?」

LABEL: 0x645F
STRING: 「Why are you here?」

LABEL: 0x64F4
STRING: 「Even though Reiri's not!」

LABEL: 0x6554
STRING: 「If it weren't for you, she would...」

LABEL: 0x6584
STRING: 「So, why did you――」

LABEL: 0x65E7
STRING: ――Survive.

LABEL: 0x6635
STRING: It was a cruel question.

LABEL: 0x664F
STRING: You couldn't blame Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x6677
STRING: And that was why you couldn't say anything.

LABEL: 0x669F
STRING: There was no answer.

LABEL: 0x66BB
STRING: Touri had cornered Tokiwa by the wall.

LABEL: 0x66EF
STRING: 「Touri, stop!」

LABEL: 0x677B
STRING: 「You should have died instead...」

LABEL: 0x67B1
STRING: 「Instead of... Reiri...」

LABEL: 0x67DE
STRING: She was being absurd.

LABEL: 0x67F8
STRING: It wasn't reasonable.

LABEL: 0x681A
STRING: But that didn't matter to her now.

LABEL: 0x6852
STRING: The dark light in her eyes glowed even duller.

LABEL: 0x68E4
STRING: 「Bye-bye, Tokiwa-chan.」

LABEL: 0x6911
STRING: She raised her knife.

LABEL: 0x6939
STRING: Just stop――

LABEL: 0x6955
STRING: ――At that moment.

LABEL: 0x6BEE
STRING: There was a sharp sound of something being pierced.

LABEL: 0x6C14
STRING: Touri let out a dumbfounded voice.

LABEL: 0x6C38
STRING: Neither I, Tokiwa, nor Touri knew what had happened.

LABEL: 0x6C7A
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x6CBB
STRING: 「Ah.」

LABEL: 0x6CD4
STRING: Letting out a small voice, Touri crumbled to the floor.

LABEL: 0x6D04
STRING: A familiar silver arrowhead was sticking out of her back.

LABEL: 0x6D78
STRING: Blood flowed from her mouth as she fell.

LABEL: 0x6DA6
STRING: She lost her balance and fell to the floor.

LABEL: 0x6DD8
STRING: Her figure seemed detached from reality, depicting a gradation between life and death――

LABEL: 0x6E37
STRING: 「Akari-chan――!」

LABEL: 0x6E60
STRING: Tokiwa screamed.

LABEL: 0x6E7A
STRING: She raised her voice in reaction to the tragedy that occurred in front of her.

LABEL: 0x6EB2
STRING: It was natural.

LABEL: 0x6ECC
STRING: But I――

LABEL: 0x6EEC
STRING: ――Couldn't even do that.

LABEL: 0x6F7A
STRING: What was going on?

LABEL: 0x6F9E
STRING: What had happened?

LABEL: 0x6FB8
STRING: Touri collapsed.

LABEL: 0x6FD2
STRING: Blood was flowing.

LABEL: 0x6FEA
STRING: The fresh blood that flowed out turned into a river, dyeing the area red.

LABEL: 0x702C
STRING: This was bad.

LABEL: 0x7048
STRING: If we didn't stop it soon――

LABEL: 0x70F6
STRING: 「――Don't move.」

LABEL: 0x711D
STRING: The moment I tried to reach my hand out to her,

LABEL: 0x71A7
STRING: her voice stopped me.

LABEL: 0x71BD
STRING: Turning toward her, I looked up.

LABEL: 0x724C
STRING: She was at the entrance of the room.

LABEL: 0x7268
STRING: She was about two meters away from us.

LABEL: 0x72A0
STRING: Yukari was standing there, dark-red light shining in from behind her.

LABEL: 0x72E0
STRING: She held her speargun with both hands.

LABEL: 0x7310
STRING: Seeing that familiar weapon in her hands, I understood everything.

LABEL: 0x7354
STRING: What had happened to Touri.

LABEL: 0x737A
STRING: What Yukari had done.

LABEL: 0x739C
STRING: 「Yukari-san!」

LABEL: 0x73B6
STRING: 「Why――」

LABEL: 0x73D4
STRING: I tried to ask her, but my words disappeared into the air.

LABEL: 0x7412
STRING: Yukari only looked at us for a few seconds.

LABEL: 0x743E
STRING: A carpet of light was spreading

LABEL: 0x746E
STRING: beneath her feet.

LABEL: 0x7577
STRING: She pulled the trigger of the speargun and shot an arrow toward her own feet.

LABEL: 0x75E0
STRING: The arrow fired at point-blank range pierced the floor with force.

LABEL: 0x762C
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x7644
STRING: It was like a drop of water falling into an aquarium.

LABEL: 0x766C
STRING: The light dodged, surrounding the arrow that had pierced the floor in a circle,

LABEL: 0x76B4
STRING: and within seconds, had once again filled the entire area.

LABEL: 0x76F2
STRING: It had no effect...

LABEL: 0x7712
STRING: Realizing this, Yukari raised her head, her speargun still pointed at her feet.

LABEL: 0x77E6
STRING: 「Both of you, get out of here.」

LABEL: 0x786D
STRING: 「Hurry!!」

LABEL: 0x7887
STRING: 「Go, or I'll shoot!」

LABEL: 0x78CA
STRING: ――Shoot.

LABEL: 0x78E6
STRING: Hearing those words, a chill ran down my spine.

LABEL: 0x791A
STRING: Yukari's eyes told me.

LABEL: 0x7936
STRING: That it wasn't a joke or a mere threat.

LABEL: 0x797C
STRING: If you wanted proof, you needed only look.

LABEL: 0x799C
STRING: That girl's twin sister was lying right in front of us.

LABEL: 0x79C2
STRING: Her chest was punctured and blood flowed from her mouth.

LABEL: 0x79F4
STRING: I thought of myself in the same state and――

LABEL: 0x7A28
STRING: I felt fear.

LABEL: 0x7A3C
STRING: I was scared.

LABEL: 0x7A50
STRING: I didn't want to die.

LABEL: 0x7A74
STRING: ...I had to run away.

LABEL: 0x7B21
STRING: However, Tokiwa――

LABEL: 0x7B43
STRING: She just stood there, glaring at Yukari with imposing eyes.

LABEL: 0x7B7F
STRING: That――

LABEL: 0x7B97
STRING: She looked stronger and more determined than ever before.

LABEL: 0x7BD7
STRING: There was sorrow, pity, and...

LABEL: 0x7BFD
STRING: ――Anger.

LABEL: 0x7C15
STRING: Tokiwa glared at Yukari in silence.

LABEL: 0x7C43
STRING: At the other end of her glare, Yukari was struggling against the light.

LABEL: 0x7CA4
STRING: 「...Aargh!」

LABEL: 0x7CC7
STRING: Light surrounded her feet and attacked her.

LABEL: 0x7CFF
STRING: She was at the end of her ability to deal with it by the speargun alone.

LABEL: 0x7D3B
STRING: Yukari finally stepped inside the room.

LABEL: 0x7D6F
STRING: Slowly and carefully, she entered the room along the wall.

LABEL: 0x7DA9
STRING: Following her, the light invaded the room as well.

LABEL: 0x7DDD
STRING: She was keeping her distance from the light that was closing in on her feet.

LABEL: 0x7E21
STRING: She walked, accompanied by the light.

LABEL: 0x7EB1
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x7ECD
STRING: 「Take Tokiwa-san!」

LABEL: 0x7F0C
STRING: Yukari shouted, her eyes still lowered to her feet.

LABEL: 0x7F3A
STRING: Her goal was to――

LABEL: 0x7F5E
STRING: 「...Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x7F7A
STRING: 「We have to get out of here.」

LABEL: 0x7F98
STRING: I grabbed Tokiwa's arm and pulled her along.

LABEL: 0x7FCE
STRING: We had to escape from this room.

LABEL: 0x7FF4
STRING: In order to survive...

LABEL: 0x8014
STRING: Yukari was circling around inside the room, tracing the edges of the walls.

LABEL: 0x8056
STRING: We slowly move around the room, symmetrical to her movements.

LABEL: 0x80A4
STRING: We should be able to get out like this.

LABEL: 0x80CE
STRING: We were...

LABEL: 0x80F9
STRING: 「Uugh...」

LABEL: 0x8118
STRING: I heard a groan at my feet.

LABEL: 0x8136
STRING: Tokiwa stopped in her tracks.

LABEL: 0x81C4
STRING: 「Akari-chan's――」

LABEL: 0x81ED
STRING: 「Tokiwa!!」

LABEL: 0x8209
STRING: Time was of the essence.

LABEL: 0x8227
STRING: Tokiwa's body shuddered as she was yelled at in close range.

LABEL: 0x8271
STRING: When I turned around, her eyes met mine.

LABEL: 0x8355
STRING: 「...I understand.」

LABEL: 0x837C
STRING: 「――Let's go.」

LABEL: 0x839A
STRING: We exited into the hallway while avoiding the light.

LABEL: 0x83D9
STRING: 「Close the door!」

LABEL: 0x83FC
STRING: Obeying Yukari, I closed the door to the room.

LABEL: 0x842A
STRING: At the last moment, she faced up and――

LABEL: 0x8526
STRING: 「Should we head to the warehouse?」

LABEL: 0x8551
STRING: 「No... There's no need for that anymore.」

LABEL: 0x857F
STRING: The reason to go there had disappeared.

LABEL: 0x85A3
STRING: 「Let's go back to the front section.」

LABEL: 0x85DF
STRING: Once again, we started running.

LABEL: 0x8612
STRING: ――Behind me, I heard another thud.

LABEL: 0x864E
STRING: It was the sound of a speargun arrow piercing flesh and blood.

LABEL: 0x88CB
STRING: 「Hmm, I think it's...

LABEL: 0x89AA
STRING: 1000 meters!

LABEL: 0x8A2C
STRING: ...Or maybe not?」

LABEL: 0x8A59
STRING: 「Unfortunately, it's not quite that deep.」

LABEL: 0x8A97
STRING: 「What we call the deep sea is where the water is more than 200 meters deep.」

LABEL: 0x8B56
STRING: 「Wow! It's a lot less than I thought!」

LABEL: 0x8C13
STRING: ――I couldn't stop her.

LABEL: 0x8CF5
STRING: 「Hey, йй-san, how did it taste?」

LABEL: 0x8D2C
STRING: 「How did it taste...?」

LABEL: 0x8D52
STRING: 「My spirit left my body.」

LABEL: 0x8D78
STRING: 「The scenery in front of me was as colorful as if it were made of cellophane――」

LABEL: 0x8E41
STRING: 「That sounds beautiful!」

LABEL: 0x8EDC
STRING: I couldn't stop Yukari――

LABEL: 0x900A
STRING: 「...Well, if Katagiri-san's with you, it'll be fine.

LABEL: 0x90EC
STRING: Yeah!」

LABEL: 0x9168
STRING: 「Reiri, don't cause too much trouble!」

LABEL: 0x91AF
STRING: 「Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x9231
STRING: 「Okay then, take care of her!」

LABEL: 0x92DD
STRING: Yukari, whose duty should have been to protect the lives of the passengers, had killed Touri.

LABEL: 0x9339
STRING: There should have been any number of ways to prevent this outcome.

LABEL: 0x9371
STRING: Things I couldn't do,

LABEL: 0x9395
STRING: things I didn't want to do...

LABEL: 0x93B5
STRING: This was the result of avoiding doing anything.

LABEL: 0x93E1
STRING: I was running away from the luminescent organism as well――

LABEL: 0x9407
STRING: Not once had I been able to stand up to anything――

LABEL: 0x943F
STRING: And as a result, those two had died.

LABEL: 0x9531
STRING: Touri and Reiri...

LABEL: 0x954D
STRING: Why did the young twins have to die?

LABEL: 0x9587
STRING: And that wasn't all.

LABEL: 0x95AF
STRING: Yukari ended up trapped inside that room as well.

LABEL: 0x95E1
STRING: The room invaded by the light――

LABEL: 0x9645
STRING: ――I knew.

LABEL: 0x9667
STRING: That was her way of sacrificing herself.

LABEL: 0x96A5
STRING: Still, I had no choice but to obey.

LABEL: 0x96CF
STRING: All I could do was leave everything to Yukari.

LABEL: 0x970B
STRING: In the end, I couldn't do anything.

LABEL: 0x973D
STRING: Up until now, all I've done was――

LABEL: 0x97D8
STRING: ...I kept running.

LABEL: 0x97FA
STRING: That was my intention.

LABEL: 0x981A
STRING: But, maybe I wouldn't have been able to do anything.

LABEL: 0x9854
STRING: Before I knew it, my run slowed down to a walk.

LABEL: 0x9892
STRING: And eventually...

LABEL: 0x9920
STRING: 「We're only halfway there, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x994E
STRING: 「Isn't it too early to stop?」

LABEL: 0x9985
STRING: She was not blaming me. She was only asking a question.

LABEL: 0x99B5
STRING: Still, I couldn't even look at her face.

LABEL: 0x99E3
STRING: 「...I don't know a way for us to survive.」

LABEL: 0x9A0F
STRING: 「...Touri's dead.」

LABEL: 0x9A31
STRING: 「Everyone's... gone.」

LABEL: 0x9A68
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x9A8D
STRING: The emotion in Tokiwa's voice might be sadness.

LABEL: 0x9AC5
STRING: Or, maybe she'd had enough of this... powerlessness of mine.

LABEL: 0x9B27
STRING: I couldn't do anything.

LABEL: 0x9B4B
STRING: Even if I put my life on the line,

LABEL: 0x9B87
STRING: I couldn't do anything.

LABEL: 0x9BB1
STRING: I couldn't obtain anything, nor could I protect anything.

LABEL: 0x9BF5
STRING: ――But was that all?

LABEL: 0x9C1B
STRING: I couldn't lose anything, break anything, or be defeated by anything.

LABEL: 0x9C6D
STRING: I was only a bystander who kept running away just to avoid sadness.

LABEL: 0x9CB3
STRING: I was... a terrible person.

LABEL: 0x9CE7
STRING: ――I felt an emotion welling up inside me.

LABEL: 0x9D09
STRING: It was neither sadness nor powerlessness.

LABEL: 0x9D3D
STRING: It was anger.

LABEL: 0x9D53
STRING: Anger toward myself for not being able to do anything, for not doing anything.

LABEL: 0x9D8B
STRING: Giving up?

LABEL: 0x9DA9
STRING: That option no longer existed.

LABEL: 0x9DD5
STRING: I had nothing left to lose.

LABEL: 0x9DFB
STRING: In that case, I had no choice but to――

LABEL: 0x9E99
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x9F14
STRING: 「I'm alive.」

LABEL: 0x9F3C
STRING: 「Yukari-san isn't dead either.」

LABEL: 0x9F6C
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei is still resting in the emergency room as well.」

LABEL: 0xA003
STRING: 「And of course, there's you...」

LABEL: 0xA02B
STRING: 「You're still alive.」

LABEL: 0xA06C
STRING: "Alive"――

LABEL: 0xA08C
STRING: She was right.

LABEL: 0xA0A6
STRING: I thought I had nothing left to lose, but I was still alive.

LABEL: 0xA0EC
STRING: People were still holding on to their lives.

LABEL: 0xA11E
STRING: That was the one thing that must not be lost.

LABEL: 0xA167
STRING: 「If you've survived...」

LABEL: 0xA192
STRING: 「――You should keep trying to survive.」

LABEL: 0xA223
STRING: I completed Tokiwa's sentence.

LABEL: 0xA24D
STRING: Tokiwa, who looked as if she had been caught off guard, quickly returned to a serious expression and nodded.

LABEL: 0xA309
STRING: 「――I can't forgive Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0xA33D
STRING: 「She has to live.」

LABEL: 0xA36B
STRING: 「She must live and make amends.」

LABEL: 0xA38F
STRING: 「That's why everyone who remains must leave this place alive.」

LABEL: 0xA3E8
STRING: It was a statement of Tokiwa's resolve.

LABEL: 0xA416
STRING: An unwavering manifestation of her will.

LABEL: 0xA4A6
STRING: 「Let's think about the best way to do that together.」

LABEL: 0xA4D8
STRING: 「The best way from here on out.」

LABEL: 0xA503
STRING: She held out her hand.

LABEL: 0xA521
STRING: There was no hesitation as I put my hand on top of hers.

LABEL: 0xA559
STRING: 「――Of course.」

LABEL: 0xA58F
STRING: Reiri, Touri... I'm sorry.

LABEL: 0xA5B5
STRING: But, there would not be any more victims.
